      private int address
      The address of the register in the BNO055

      The number of bytes stored at the register

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private Register​(int address)  
      private Register​(int address, int bytes)
      Create a scalar register which represents an arbitrary number of bytes (assumed little-endian)
      private Register​(int address, int bytes, boolean signed)
      Create a scalar register which represents and arbitrary number of bytes (assumed little-endian) which can be signed
      private Register​(int address, int bytes, int components, boolean signed)
      Create a vector register with an arbitrary number of bytes (assumed little-endian)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Register

        private Register​(int address)

      • Register

        private Register​(int address,
                 int bytes)
        Create a scalar register which represents an arbitrary number of bytes (assumed little-endian)
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the register
        bytes - The number of bytes which store the value at the register

      • Register

        private Register​(int address,
                 int bytes,
                 boolean signed)
        Create a scalar register which represents and arbitrary number of bytes (assumed little-endian) which can be signed
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the register
        bytes - The number of bytes which store the value at the register
        signed - The value stored at the register is a signed value

      • Register

        private Register​(int address,
                 int bytes,
                 int components,
                 boolean signed)
        Create a vector register with an arbitrary number of bytes (assumed little-endian)
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the register
        bytes - The number of bytes which store the value at the register
        components - THe number of components in the vector
        signed - The value stored at the register is a signed value

        private int processBuf​(byte[] buf,
                       int index)
        Process the buffer into the correct int value
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer contain the value to read
        index - The location in the buffer containing the LSB
        Returns:
        Integer value containing the processed value

      • writeVector

        private void writeVector​(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.I2C bno055,
                         int[] vector)
                  throws BNO055.BNO055Exception
        Write a vector of values to the BNO055 Number of bytes written defined by register. Number of elements in vector must match.
        Parameters:
        bno055 - I2C object connected to the BNO055 chip
        vector - Values to write
        Throws:
        BNO055.BNO055Exception
